title: आर.बी.आई द्वारा आधिकारिक तौर पर ९ वाणिज्यिक बैंकों को बंद करने की अफवाह को खारिज किया गया है
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: There are mischievous rumours on Social Media (picture below) about @RBI closing some banks. No question of closing any #PSB, which are articles of faith. Rather Govt is strengthening PSBs with reforms and infusion of capital to better serve its customers @FinMinIndia @PIB_India pic.twitter.com/43XoZGoOa0
